General.Name: Beijing Advanced Digital Technology Co Ltd
General.Description: Beijing Advanced Digital Technology Co., Ltd provides information technology (IT) solutions and professional services for the financial, Internet, and government and enterprise industries for in China. The company offers Sharkata, an enterprise data management and service platform; Moia Control, an enterprise unified task scheduling platform; distributed cloud data center and data governance implementation consulting solutions; and enterprise software and service cloud. It also provides information technology technical services. The company was founded in 2000 and is headquartered in Beijing, China. Beijing Advanced Digital Technology Co., Ltd was formerly a subsidiary of Green Leader Holdings Group Limited.
